name: mayan-edms
description: Mayan EDMS is an enterprise-grade electronic document management system with OCR, metadata extraction, and workflow automation. Itâ€™s designed for archival, search, and compliance needs in self-hosted environments.
features: OCR processing: Automatically extract text from scanned documents for full-text search and indexing.
Metadata extraction: Capture document properties, dates, and custom metadata for organization.
Workflow automation: Define document processing workflows with approval chains and notifications.
Version control: Track document revisions with complete history and ability to restore previous versions.
Access control: Set granular permissions on documents and folders based on users and groups.
Full-text search: Find documents quickly by searching through content, metadata, and tags.
Document tagging: Apply multiple tags to documents for flexible categorization and filtering.
Cabinet organization: Structure documents in hierarchical cabinets and folders like physical filing.
Retention policies: Automatically manage document lifecycle with configurable retention rules.
Digital signatures: Sign documents electronically with support for various signature standards.
API integration: Automate document management tasks through comprehensive REST API.
Multi-format support: Handle PDF, images, Office documents, and many other file types.
